p: All Iquitos and Phnom Penh FGD community participants felt the device distribution needs to be coupled with strong community outreach and training. Study participants strongly believed that acceptability would be high due to the simplicity of the test kits. However, the actual use of the test would rely on the accuracy of its result: “[You] need to give the test kits to population to try it, if it is accurate, then they will choose the test kits” (FGD, Deum Chan village).
